data.title: Lions Gate Hospital Foundation
data.meta_description: Lions Gate Hospital Foundation is the fundraising arm of LGH and the publicly funded health-care facilities across the North Shore.
data.text:
WHEN YOU WALK, WE ALL WIN!

Mark you calendars for Step Up for LGH which returns to the Seawall at Millennium Park in West Vancouver on Sunday, September 29. Participants in last year’s walk-a-thon raised a magnificent $80,030 and we hope you will join us for a fun-filled activity day in support of LGH.

BECOME A MONTHLY DONOR

Together our monthly donors make a blooming big difference.

Your recurring donations support the hospital’s most urgent areas across many different departments. Sign up once and receive a consolidated tax receipt in February for all the previous year’s donations.

Support the Lions Gate Hospital 50/50

Congratulations to LGH staff member Darlene B., the winner of our Easter 50/50 Draw on March 28! Darlene has worked as an OR Nurse at LGH for more than 20 years. The total jackpot was $46,980 and Darlene took home a cheque for $23,490.

Stay tuned for our Spring draw starting on April 14, 2024!
